page.internal-name: BUSINESS SUPERVISION OF PROCESSED FOOD INDUSTRY
page.navLabel: BUSINESS SUPERVISION OF PROCESSED FOOD INDUSTRY
page.title_s: BUSINESS SUPERVISION OF PROCESSED FOOD INDUSTRY
page.content_html:
QTY: 02

AREA:

Region 1: Thai Nguyen Bac Giang, Bac Ninh

Region 2: Lao Cai, Yen Bai, Tuyen Quang, Ha Giang

JOB DESCRIPTION:

- Perform work as directed by supervisor

- Report on the results of the work performed and the data of the area in charge

- Implement outbound marketing programs

- Serve, deliver goods to customers according to function

- Open sales and distribution points in the area

Detailed Experience/Skills

- Honest, responsible at work, oriented to work and stick with the company for a long time

- High responsibility in work

- Able to work under pressure

- Having sales skills in the field of Frozen Food is an advantage

Description

- Education level: Major in Marketing, Business Administration...

- Experience level: 1 year or more

- Type of work: Full-time fixed

- Age: 25-35

- Gender: Male/Female

Contact Info:

- Send CV to email address: Tuyendung@mavinfood.com

- Address: 4th floor, Hudland Building, No. 6, Nguyen Huu Tho, Hoang Mai, Hanoi

- Hotline: 0912.038.862 (Ms Huong)
